subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony’s recent statement about having “an energy that I haven’t had so far this season” under the Knicks’ interim coach Mike Woodson has raised eyebrows and questions.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony’s recent statement about having “an energy that I haven’t had so far this season” under the Knicks’ interim coach Mike Woodson has raised eyebrows and questions.
